description: Massive stellar body - ONLY fuel extraction (speed 1-4 only)
Massive gas planet - 50% chance of rings (fuel + crystals if rings
Rocky terrestrial planet - metal OR fuel OR crystals (varied per instance
Frozen world - metal OR fuel OR crystals (varied per instance
Colorful gas cloud - exotic particles and rare materials
Small planetary satellite - metal OR crystals (NO fuel
Mineable space rocks - metal AND crystals (NO fuel)
Dense asteroid field - metal AND crystals (NO fuel)
Abandoned resource caches - instant rewards
Abandoned orbital facility - salvage tech components and blueprints
Derelict fleets - salvage materials and ship parts
Orbital satellites - hack for blueprints and navigation data
Merchant vessels - purchase upgrades and blueprints
Hostile alien installations - high-risk encounters with great rewards
Ancient alien installations - powerful unique upgrades
Portal to next sector - spawned by distance traveled
Super powerful black hole gives massive speed change with gravity assist
Fuel-rich gas pocket suspended in nebula clouds
Dense fuel-rich gas pocket deep within nebula
Large comet with crystal ice deposits trailing through debris
High-velocity debris stream near black hole (requires speed 5+)
Fortified alien city installation with high-value resources
Hostile alien patrol ships on patrol route
Small alien military outpost with moderate defenses
Ancient machine intelligence offering exotic technology trades
Automated defense drones patrolling machine territory
Contaminated wreckage or bio-hazard site
Intense gravity well providing massive speed changes (0.5 multiplier)
